articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Global anaemia burden: Lancet study says the condition affected nearly 2 billion people in 2021 - The Economic Times
articles.description: Twice as many women than men were found to have anaemia in 2021 according to The Lancet Haematology. Anaemia affected almost two billion people in 2021, with Western and Central sub-Saharan Africa revealing the highest prevalence.
articles.content: NEW DELHI: Compared to men, twice as many women were found to have anaemia in 2021, with the prevalence factor being more than three times during their reproductive age, new research published in The… [+3191 chars]
